content: the last 6 row 3 more times you should have 96 sts break the yarn place sts on stitch holder size 2 only work 8 row of stockinette flat starting with a rs row decrease row rs k1 ssk k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn work 11 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row decrease row k1 ssk k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn work 9 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com you should have 102 sts break the yarn place sts on stitch holder all other sizes work - - 38 32 24 18 30 24 16 row of stockinette flat starting with a rs row increase row rs k2 m1l k until 2 sts remaining m1r k2 turn next row p to end turn repeat the last 2 row - - 4 9 14 19 14 19 24 more times you should have - - 118 128 138 148 154 164 174 sts break the yarn place sts on stitch holder back piece with 4 5 mm needles from the rs pick up and knit 29 29 29 29 29 29 37 37 37 sts along the length of the left shoulder saddle from the cast off corner to the cast on corner place marker using the working yarn cast on 50 sts cable cast on is suggested for structural strength place marker from the rs pick up and knit 29 29 29 29 29 29 37 37 37 sts along the length of the right shoulder saddle from the cast on corner to the cast off corner the pick up rate is about 2 sts for every 3 row you should have 108 108 108 108 108 108 124 124 124 sts row 1 ws p to m sm p to m rm p5 turn row 2 rs make a ds k to m rm k5 turn row 3 make a ds p to previous ds resolve ds p5 turn row 4 make a ds k to previous ds resolve ds k5 turn repeat the last two row 3 3 3 3 3 3 5 5 5 more times next row p to previous ds resolve ds p to end turn next row k to previous ds resolve ds k to end turn size 1 only work 5 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row decrease row k1 ssk k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com repeat the last 6 row 5 more times you should have 96 sts do not break yarn continue with body size 2 only work 11 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row decrease row k1 ssk k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn repeat the last twelve row 2 more times work 9 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row you should have 102 sts do not break
